summary: Container class that encapsulates the results of a Longformer masked language model forward pass in TensorFlow, including optional loss, token prediction scores, per‑layer hidden representations, and both local and global attention weight tensors.
business_intent: Enable users to retrieve and manipulate the core outputs of a Longformer masked language model for training, inference, and analysis, supporting loss‑based optimization and detailed inspection of hidden states and attention mechanisms.
